title: Understanding Local Tax Structures
description: A comprehensive exploration of local, county, and municipal tax systems, including property taxes, local sales taxes, and special district assessments. Students learn to analyze how local taxes fund community services and impact personal finances.
learning_objectives: Analyze different types of local taxes and their purposes in funding community services
Calculate personal property tax obligations using assessment values and millage rates
Evaluate how local tax structures vary across different jurisdictions and impact personal finances
Compare tax rates and services across different municipalities to make informed residency decisions
Interpret property tax bills and understand assessment, exemptions, and appeal processes

skill_builder.title: Local Tax Impact Calculator
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students calculate total local tax obligations based on property values, local rates, and special assessments, comparing tax burdens across different jurisdictions.
